name: Processors
desc: Central Processing Units from leading manufacturers like Intel and AMD. Choose from various generations including high-performance gaming processors, workstation-grade CPUs, and budget-friendly options with different core counts and clock speeds.

name: Graphics Cards
desc: Dedicated graphics processing units for gaming, content creation, and professional visualization. Our selection includes the latest RTX and Radeon series cards with various VRAM capacities, cooling solutions, and performance tiers.

name: Motherboards
desc: The foundation of any PC build, available in different form factors (ATX, Micro-ATX, Mini-ITX) and chipsets. Compatible with various CPU sockets and offering different expansion options, connectivity, and overclocking capabilities.

name: Memory (RAM)
desc: System memory modules in various capacities, speeds, and configurations. Choose from DDR4 and DDR5 options with different latencies, RGB lighting effects, and performance profiles for gaming and productivity.

name: Storage Devices
desc: Data storage solutions including ultra-fast NVMe SSDs, SATA SSDs, and high-capacity HDDs. Options range from high-performance PCIe 4.0 drives to reliable backup storage with various capacities and form factors.

name: Power Supplies (PSUs)
desc: Reliable power supply units with different wattage ratings and efficiency certifications (80 Plus Bronze to Titanium). Available in modular, semi-modular, and non-modular designs to power your entire system safely and efficiently.
